SELECT FN_GET_CODENAME('UR005', RTBASE.SYS_GB_CD) AS SYS_GB_NM ,RTLOG.RT_TGT_SEQ ,RTBASE.RT_TGT_NM ,TO_CHAR(RTBASE.SYS_REG_DTM, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS MENU_REG_DTM ,COUNT(DISTINCT RTLOG.USER_ID) AS USER_CNT ,COUNT(*) AS MENU_USE_CNT ,TO_CHAR(MAX(RTLOG.SYS_REG_DTM), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS LAST_USE_DTM FROM ST_RT_TGT_BASE_LOG RTLOG ,ST_RT_TGT_BASE RTBASE WHERE RTLOG.RT_TGT_SEQ = RTBASE.RT_TGT_SEQ
GROUP BY RTBASE.SYS_GB_CD, RTLOG.RT_TGT_SEQ, RTBASE.RT_TGT_NM, RTBASE.SYS_REG_DTM

AND RTLOG.SYS_REG_DTM BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP(#{useStrtDtm}||' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(#{userEndDtm}||' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND RTBASE.RT_TGT_NM LIKE #{rtTgtNm} ||'%' AND RTBASE.SYS_GB_CD LIKE #{sysGbCd} ||'%' AND RTLOG.USER_ID LIKE #{userId} ||'%'

SELECT FN_GET_CODENAME('UR005', RTBASE.SYS_GB_CD) AS SYS_GB_NM ,RTLOG.RT_TGT_SEQ ,RTBASE.RT_TGT_NM ,RTLOG.USER_ID ,(SELECT SUB.USER_NM FROM ST_USER_BASE SUB WHERE SUB.USER_ID = RTLOG.USER_ID LIMIT 1) AS USER_NM ,TO_CHAR(MAX(RTLOG.SYS_REG_DTM), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS LAST_USE_DTM ,COUNT(*) AS USER_MENU_USE_CNT FROM ST_RT_TGT_BASE_LOG RTLOG ,ST_RT_TGT_BASE RTBASE WHERE RTLOG.RT_TGT_SEQ = RTBASE.RT_TGT_SEQ
GROUP BY RTBASE.SYS_GB_CD, RTLOG.RT_TGT_SEQ, RTBASE.RT_TGT_NM, RTLOG.USER_ID
